# Doodon Buildings
## Town Hall The doodon town hall is the heart of the doodon village. It keeps track of population, buildings, and housing capacity. Without the town hall, doodon buildings will cease to function. [color=yellow]Housing capacity[/color] is the limiting factor of how many doodons can live in the village. If there are more houses than a specific doodon, then you can spend resin at a house to respawn that doodon. If there are greater or equal doodons to houses, then no more doodons can spawn.
## Houses:
### Dwelling Dwellings serve as housing for workers. Each dwelling provides two housing for workers, and spawns one when built. Respawning one worker costs 1 resin.
### Warrior Hut Huts provide housing for warriors, and produce one when built. Each hut provides one housing for warriors. Respawning one warrior costs 3 resin.
### Pasture Pastures house three moodons, and spawn one when built. Moodons can milked or grinded for omnizine, and can serve as good trade material. Spawning one moodon costs 1 resin.
## Refiners:
Refiners provide another source of resin. Refiners take time, so it might be wise to build multiple of each.
## Workshops:
### Gem Cutter:
Refines resin into a valuable gem. This gem has no use to the doodons, but can serve as trade material.
### Shieldsmith:
Presses resin into a cruddy shield.
### Swordsmith:
Smiths resin into a surprisingly sharp sword
